document.full_text: the afghan taliban rejected as "propaganda" on monday unsourced media reports that their reclusive leader, mullah mohammad omar, had been killed in pakistan, saying he was alive and in afghanistan and vowing to continue their insurgency.
document.title: afghan taliban say leader mullah omar "safe and sound"
lines_and_colors: the afghan taliban rejected as "propaganda" on monday unsourced media reports that their reclusive leader, mullah mohammad omar, had been killed in pakistan, saying he was alive and in afghanistan and vowing to continue their insurgency.
